segments.text: Today , you need to pay 20 RIB in handling fees .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can't you just take it from my account ? I can't be bothered with cash dealings today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I must tell you that because your banking has been such a large amount , you need to wait until you leave the country to get any currency back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean , if there is any left over ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , totally . It's nice to meet a customer who understands the system .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right , so the deposit , if I don't draw on it will be blocked after you get the Deposit Certification ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . I know we have a complex system , but you have caught on so quickly .
segments.speaker: S1
